00043 #ifndef __LIBCFS_STRING_H__
00044 #define __LIBCFS_STRING_H__
00045 
00046 /* libcfs_string.c */
00047 char *cfs_strrstr(const char *haystack, const char *needle);
00048 /* Convert a text string to a bitmask */
00049 int cfs_str2mask(const char *str, const char *(*bit2str)(int bit),
00050                  int *oldmask, int minmask, int allmask);
00051 /* trim leading and trailing space characters */
00052 char *cfs_firststr(char *str, size_t size);
00053 
00057 struct cfs_lstr {
00058         char            *ls_str;
00059         int             ls_len;
00060 };
00061 
00062 /*
00063  * Structure to represent <range_expr> token of the syntax.
00064  */
00065 struct cfs_range_expr {
00066         /*
00067          * Link to cfs_expr_list::el_exprs.
00068          */
00069         struct list_head        re_link;
00070         __u32                   re_lo;
00071         __u32                   re_hi;
00072         __u32                   re_stride;
00073 };
00074 
00075 struct cfs_expr_list {
00076         struct list_head        el_link;
00077         struct list_head        el_exprs;
00078 };
00079 
00080 char *cfs_trimwhite(char *str);
00081 int cfs_gettok(struct cfs_lstr *next, char delim, struct cfs_lstr *res);
00082 int cfs_str2num_check(char *str, int nob, unsigned *num,
00083                       unsigned min, unsigned max);
00084 int cfs_expr_list_match(__u32 value, struct cfs_expr_list *expr_list);
00085 int cfs_expr_list_print(char *buffer, int count,
00086                         struct cfs_expr_list *expr_list);
00087 int cfs_expr_list_values(struct cfs_expr_list *expr_list,
00088                          int max, __u32 **values);
00089 static inline void
00090 cfs_expr_list_values_free(__u32 *values, int num)
00091 {
00092         /* This array is allocated by LIBCFS_ALLOC(), so it shouldn't be freed
00093          * by OBD_FREE() if it's called by module other than libcfs & LNet,
00094          * otherwise we will see fake memory leak */
00095         LIBCFS_FREE(values, num * sizeof(values[0]));
00096 }
00097 
00098 void cfs_expr_list_free(struct cfs_expr_list *expr_list);
00099 int cfs_expr_list_parse(char *str, int len, unsigned min, unsigned max,
00100                         struct cfs_expr_list **elpp);
00101 void cfs_expr_list_free_list(struct list_head *list);
